SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE J, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 4

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE RETURN IS PRESENTED TO THE KEY OFFICERS, FINANCE COMMITTEE AND ALL INTERESTED TRUSTEES FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO THE RELEASE OF THE RETURN.

ALL INTERESTED PERSONS MUST SIGN AN ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT. A CONFLICT OF INTEREST COMMITTEE WAS APPOINTED BY THE METHODIST HOMES FOR THE AGING BOARD TO MONITOR AND ENFORCE CONLFICT OF INTEREST ISSUES.

THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF METHODIST HOMES FOR THE AGING SHALL SET THE COMPENSATION OF THE EXECUTIVE STAFF. THE EXECUTIVE STAFF SHALL RECOMMEND COMPENSATION FOR THE KEY EMPLOYEES AND STAFF AT ALL THE FACILITIES. THE RECOMMENDATIONS ARE REVIEWED, APPROVED OR MODIFIED BY FINANCE COMMITTEE.

THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF METHODIST HOMES FOR THE AGING SETS THE COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE STAFF. THE EXECUTIVE STAFF SHALL RECOMMEND COMPENSATION FOR THE KEY EMPLOYEES AND STAFF AT ALL THE FACILITIES. THE RECOMMENDATIONS ARE REVIEWED, APPROVED, OR MODIFIED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE.
BY APPOINTMENT INSPECTION CAN BE MADE AT 1520 COOPER HILL ROAD, BIRMINGHAM, AL 35210
